TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IGeneratedTask implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask

Docs.summary: An interface implemented by tasks that are generated by [ITaskFactory](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) instances.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetPropertyValue(class Microsoft.Build.Framework.TaskPropertyInfo property) cil managed

Docs.returns: The value of the named property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks MSBuild calls this method after executing the task to get output parameters. All exceptions from this method will be caught in the taskExecution host and logged as a fatal task error.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetPropertyValue (Microsoft.Build.Framework.TaskPropertyInfo property, object value);
